protocol.text: Array was scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 7G.
The results were quantified and analyzed by use of MicroArray Suite 5.0 software (Affymetrix Inc.).

10-day old seedlings were transferred to ES (+Fe) and ES without addition of FeEDTA (–Fe) medium, respectively. Tissues were harvested and immediately frozen in liquid nitrogen 3 days after the transfer.
Total RNA was extracted using the Qiagen RNeasy mini kit.

Ten microgram of total RNA was used for cDNA synthesis, labeled by in vitro transcription, followed by fragmentation according to the manufacturer's suggestion (GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual rev5, Affymetrix).
Ten microgram labeled samples were hybridized to the ATH1 Genome Array at 45℃ for 16.5 h. Washing and staining involved Fluidics Station-450 and the ATH1 Genome.
Array was scanned with the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 7G.
The results were quantified and analyzed by use of MicroArray Suite 5.0 software (Affymetrix Inc.)

Ten micrograms of total RNA was used for cDNA synthesis and labeled by in vitro transcription followed by fragmentation according to the manufacturer's suggestion (GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual rev5, Affymetrix).
Ten micrograms of labeled samples were hybridized to the ATH1 Genome Array at 45℃ for 16.5 h. Washing and staining involved Fluidics Station-450 and the ATH1 Genome Array.
